ED_Title: Programme planning (Special Political and Decolonization Committee (Fourth Committee))
ED_DecisionText: At its 41st plenary meeting, on 10 December 2020, the General Assembly took note of the report of the Special Political and Decolonization Committee (Fourth Committee) (A/75/421).
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
